data.title: Wanted: Angela Aki 'These Words'

This was her first album and only US release but it is hard to find! If anyone out there has a copy they are willing to part with or knows where I can get a copy it would be much appreciated!! Thanks!

I love Angela Aki, but haven't managed to get any of her albums. Hopefully this summer while I'm in Japan I can pick up some. Her voice is gorgeous and refreshing, very rich. Sorry I can't help you out with album-finding.

My wife lives in Japan and this is the only CD she can't get. It was her first and only released in the US. You can find any of her other CD on my of the sites to include amazon....

I am personally looking for this too, but still can't find it. Tried CDjapan, but it's not available there either.

http://www.cdjapan.co.jp/list_from_c...tml?key=364306

She should be releasing an English album rather soon (probably within a year or two). I read that she has some recording contract with some company. I doubt one can find a copy of "these words" unless you look really, really, really hard.
